system.description:
This School of magic is concerned with mastery of the earth. This includes mud, clay, stone, metal and glass. Spells from this School require strong, clear gestures to be cast, as well as words of power.

Spontaneous Casting Complexities

ComplexityEffect
0

Learn the properties of earth, stone or metal

1

Alter the shape or of or control earth

2

Inflict Health damage with stone or metal; alter the shape of stone

3

Create or destroy stone

4

Alter the shape of or control metal

5

Create or destroy metal
